project_abstract.cdata: The introduction of diversified curricula in 50 provincial secondary schools through the provision of additional classrooms, workshops, equipment, technical assistance and training; the establishment a national adult education program comprising a national and four regional adult education centers responsible for research, curriculum development and training, and 24 life-long education centers responsible for extending adult education to 8,400 villages in their respective provinces, including the provision of necessary buildings, equipment, technical assistance and training.
